file_content.text: Shuttle is repaired and ready to go.
It's an honor, my lord Wrath.
You're the... commander, yes? I was told to expect you.
You're the bounty hunter? I've seen your authorization.
Sergeant Defain, Twenty-first Starfighter Division. Flew sorties at the Battles of Coruscant and Ilum, decorated for both.
Never thought I'd be in Hutt Space while the Republic's chasing our fleet. Whatever we're after here, I hope it's worth it.
We're risking everything today. If it's not enough... the Empire falls.
I hope it's worth it, too.
This planet--can you tell me anything relevant?
I haven't seen anything but the atmospherics. They're bad enough, though--energy charge in the stratosphere makes landing anything larger than a shuttle impossible.
You will fly me to the surface of Makeb, and you will ask no questions. Understood?
I should warn you--the flight's going to be rough. Atmospheric energy charge makes landing anything larger than a shuttle impossible.
Our girl here's the right size, but she's built for stealth, not grit. Hold on tight.
